page.title: 09PROTECTIVE PAPERS & HARBOUR
page.content: {PROTECTIVE PAPERS LTD.- We went to {visit a local factory called P.P.L. {which is a printing factory where {about 115 people work. Several {machines printed coloured patterns on {to paper.(Food wrapping, wallpaper and {greeting paper) We watched machines {that cut paper into customers wishes {and the packing rooms, where the paper {was stored for delivery, to mainly {U.K. customers.by}Chereen Smith. HARBOUR - Mr. Muller looks after the harbour as harbour master.The harbour imports timber and wine for Portugal and steel from Spain, they export steel,waste paper and tractors. There are 36 people who work on the east pier of the harbour which has 2-3 ships a week owned by Willie Lines. The cargo is carried by StreetsLorries with 18 lorries and 75 trailers. The harbour has 52 small pleasure yachts.
